narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection.
The owner is applying for an A license to breed dogs and sell their offspring.  To acquire an A license the licensing
fee must be sent to:
USDA, APHIS, AC
920 Main Campus
Suite 200
Raleigh, NC  27606
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the applicant.
NO REGULATED ACTIVITIES MAY BE CONDUCTED UNTIL A VALID USDA LICENSE IS OBTAINED.
